original_text: Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the Lord, and he will have mercy upon him; and to our God, for he will abundantly pardon.
korean_text: 악인은 그의 길을, 불의한 자는 그의 생각을 버리고 여호와께로 돌아오라 그리하면 그가 긍휼히 여기시리라 우리 하나님께로 돌아오라 그가 너그럽게 용서하시리라

sentences.original_text: Let the wicked forsake his way
and the unrighteous man his thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 불의한 자는 그 생각을 버리게 하라

sentences.original_text: and let him return unto the Lord
and he will have mercy upon him
